headline: Leidos (LDOS) Valuation in Focus After Dividend Hike and New AI-Powered Cyber Defense Alliance
summary: Leidos Holdings (LDOS) just announced a bump in its quarterly dividend, increasing it by three cents to $0.43 per share. This move, along with a new AI-driven cyber defense alliance, stands out for investors. See our latest analysis for Leidos Holdings. Leidos Holdings has kept the headlines coming, from boosting its dividend to lining up a cutting-edge AI cyber defense alliance and streamlining its portfolio with targeted divestitures. While short-term share price returns have wavered, down...
